subject: Representation for exemption from levy of user fee
text: #Rr4 <7f TTTTT wfaqrut Phone 91-11-25074100/26074200 (3+ 4v6t 3t 7nt 44T4) Fax 91-11-25093507/25093514 Extn_ 2223/2318/2468/2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport & Highways) 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Deihi-110Q75 NHAI/ 13013/50/02-03/CMD-CO/ Non-VIP (92Vto* 10.11.2004 CIRCULAR NO. NHAI/COMMERCIAL OPERATIONS_ 50 Sub:   Representation for exemption from levy of user fee: Of late, it has been observed that references are received from various Public Sector Organizations |Autonomous Bodies of Central Government/State Government claiming exemption from of user fee for their vehicles. As per various notifications issued by the Government of India for of user only such vehicles which are Central Government/ State Government vehicles , while on duty, shall be exempted No other vehicles owned hired by Public Sector Undertaking/Autonomous Bodies, whether controlled Or funded by Central O1 State Government can be treated a8 vehicles of Central/ State Government As such, same will not be eligible {or exemption. Project Directors are directed not to refer such cases to Corporate Office and may deal with such requests at their level as per above directions: This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. (M M Lohia) General Manager (CO) To All PIU / CMU Copy submitted for information to All Members / CVO All CGMs All GMs PS to Chairman Librarian Z:ImmlohiaIneelamIGC-Vijayawada doc #T & 7 % NHAL being levy levy jee,
